body.name: Steamer for Clothes, 2024 Updated Travel Steamer, Portable Handheld Clothes Steamer, 10 Second Fast Heat-up, Auto-Off, Steam Iron Fabric Wrinkle Remover with Brush for Home and Travel
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: NEW TECHNOLOGY: Bear garment Steamer adopts cutting-edge heating technology, producing more powerful steam than other 2000W steamers - and it only takes 10 seconds to start generating steam. This technologically advanced handheld steamer is perfect for all your fabric needs

PORTABLE FABRIC STEAMER: Our compact 8.4''6''3'' steamer is the perfect travel companion. Its lightweight design and 120ml water tank allow for over 10 minutes of continuous steaming, making it ideal for use on the go or at home

ERGONOMIC DESIGN: With a 20° tilt angle design, our garment steamer is more comfortable to use. The 360° anti-spilling design allows for vertical or horizontal steaming, and the 6ft prolonged power cord provides enhanced flexibility

SUITABLE FOR ALL FABRICS: Our steamer has strong penetrating power, making it suitable for all fabrics in all four seasons. The attached fabric brush can effectively clean visible dust from deep inside the fabric, providing a thorough cleaning solution

WARRANTY AND TRUST: We offer a 30-day refund policy, as well as a three-year after-sale service with 24-hour customer support and lifelong technical assistance. At BEAR, our goal is to provide the best possible service to our valued customers
body.description: Bear portable steamer for clothes Unique Advanced Features Safe: Automatic shut-off System when it gets too hot or lacks water Quick: 10S rapid steam generation Notes : Garment steamer will be tested for wet water before leaving the factory to ensure normal use. Therefore, there may be water vapor or water droplets residual inside the machine, which will not affect normal use, please don't worry! Optimized 120 ML water tank. Power: AC 120V | 60HZ | 1000W Bear garment steamers dimensions: 8.3 x 5.9 x 3 (in) Weight: 1.45 lbs 3-Year Manufacturer WNTY

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Bear steamer for clothes Impeccable results! Its 120 ml (4.05 oz) tank heats up in just 10 secs and powerfully steams for over 10 mins.Upgraded advanced technology for Iron Steaming, ensuring crisp and unruffled clothes at all times.Its 360° Portability provides a DRY steaming no matter the angle you use it. NO LEAKS!A 100% Safe to use Garment Steamer, gentle with ALL types of fabrics and garments.Hot Steam eliminate unhealthy agents on clothes, a Necessity at home for this Global Health Emergency.Stunning Luxury Designs, Steam it off! Add Brush Accessory!
Step 1 Filling water into tank Step 2 Tank installation Step 3 Press the button to preheat 10s,until the light off Step 4 Press the steam button again to start

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This steamer has a chic design. It is a but bulky, but it definitely does what it is supposed to. It came with a nice brush attachment as well. The cord is nice and long which I like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great size, decent power, and great value.
reviews.reviewText: This is a great small steamer. The only thing that I would change is I wish that the handle was adjustable or collapsible. It does come with an attachment, I did not bring it with me when I traveled. This will fit inna personal bag or carry-on suitcase easily. I threw this in my personal bag. Since this is a travel steamer you do have to fill it a little more often, it gets hot fast so you don't have to wait long. This is a great quality and I would definitely get this again. It is lightweight and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cord is too short, steam is not powerful
reviews.reviewText: The cord of this steamer is 70" long. Almost 6 feet, which seems fine. But as most electrical outlets are near the floor, and you steam things when they are hanging up- that means you have to be standing right next to the outlet to use it. I literally couldn't reach the shirt I wanted to steam, because the shirt was hanging 4 feet away from the wall. So I took it into the bathroom, because the outlets are higher- I couldn't find anywhere close enough to the outlets to hang my shirt there either. So I decided to use my special extension cord that is for irons to test this- but I couldn't use the extension cord, because this steamer has a 3 prong plug and extension cords for irons only have two prong holes. Besides, this is for travel. Who wants to pack an extension cord? I decided to just cheat and sit on the floor and hold the clothes as best as I could to test it. I tried it on a pair of medium weight pants and I tried it on a light weight button down shirt. I was less than impressed. I had to go over the same areas over and over again to get wrinkles out. This machine is worthless to me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Nice Quality Steam
reviews.reviewText: Right away I noticed the quality of this steamer. It’s not overly heavy and burdensome to carry or hold but it’s not cheaply made and lightweight were you feel like it’s cheaply made. It works great at getting wrinkles out of everything…yes I was so excited about this I steamed wrinkles out of everything I could find from curtains, dress shirts, dresses, sheets, brand new shower curtain with those “I’m brand Nee” lines, and so much more. Works like a champs and so easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Added some water and within a few minutes the steam started. We tested on a Blazer for work and noticed the wrinkles coming out right away. It's not bad for a small steamer. And good for travel!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made, heavyweight steamer
reviews.reviewText: This is super easy news. The only thing that I wish it had was container to carry the water in to fill it like my other one has but other than that this is very well-made. I like that it’s got the brush attachment, to help steam out wrinklesThis is very good quality in the excellent value in my opinion🤔🥰👍🏻
